page.title: 19LEISURE TIME
page.content: A variety of leisure-time activities are carried out.If adults stay in,they like to watch television(videos are now extremely common),read,knit,garden & DIY.Many people also go out on 1 or 2 nights a week.They usually go to a local pub or Workingmen's Club,where snooker,darts,dominoes,bingo,musical & comedy acts and having bar meals are very popular.There are 8 pubs& 2 Workingmen's Clubs in our rural area. In Hunwick there is a thriving Community Centre,set up in the last 3 years.Lots of children attend the Youth Club(which also holds discos) & there is thrice-weekly playgroup for pre-school children.There are also bingo sessions, an OAP club,Women's Institute & Ladies Keep Fit Classes. The Community is also a very popular meeting place.The other villages have no centres of this kind.
